rottapeli.domain

Class Rat

  • java.lang.Object
    • rottapeli.domain.superclasses.Entity
      • rottapeli.domain.superclasses.Positioned
        • rottapeli.domain.superclasses.Moveable
          • rottapeli.domain.Rat
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Controllable, Killable, Updatable

    public class Rat
extends Moveable
implements Killable, Controllable
    Main character controlled by player 1.

    Entity that is controllable by player 1. Once receiving a command to move it starts moving at a constand speed at a given direction. While moving Rat creates a track of Tails behind itself. Rat eats Eatable Entities. Rat stops moving when it hits a Hidable Entity, destroying its Tails. Rat dies when it's hit by a hazardous Entity, for example a Ball or its own Tail.

    Author:
    Pavel

    • Method Detail

      • eat

        public void eat(Eatable other)
        Eats another Eatable Entity.

        Calls getEaten() method to the Entity given as a parameter. Rat also calls gameLogic to award points for this endeavour.

        Parameters:
        other - Eatable Entity that is to be eaten.

      • hide

        public void hide(Hidable other)
        Hides in a Hidable object.

        Rat removes its track of Tails, faces away from the Hidable Entity and stops moving.

        Parameters:
        other - Hidable entity where Rat hides in.

      • faceAwayFrom

        public void faceAwayFrom(Hidable other)
        Faces away from the object where Rat hides in.

        Judging by the way Rat approached Hidable Entity sets Rats new direction.

        Parameters:
        other - Hidable entity where Rat hides in.

      • examineTail

        public void examineTail(Tail tail)
        Reacts to the collision with Tail.

        If tail was created by this Rat calls die() method on the Tail unless Tail is the most recently created Tail. In that case don't create Tail this tick on the timer.

        Parameters:
        tail - Tail with which Rat collided.

      • createTail

        public void createTail()
        Creates a Tail segment as a part of the Tail track.

      • removeTails

        public void removeTails()
        Removes all Tail segments created by this Rat.

      • stopMoving

        public void stopMoving()
        Stops Rat from moving and tells ScoreKeeper to reset player 1's combo.

      • defaultPosition

        public void defaultPosition()
        Places the Entity at a specified location. Must be overriden to be functional.

        Rat is placed in the middle of the upper ledge of the playing field. This method also destroys tails, makes Rat face downwards and stops it from moving.

        Overrides:
        defaultPosition in class Positioned

      • reactToCollision

        public void reactToCollision(Entity other,
                    boolean notOnTheEdge)
        This method is called every collision in order to do further actions according to the collided entity's properties. Must be overriden if this Entity does anything on collisions

        Rat hides in Hidable Entities, eats Eatable Entities and dies from Tails.

        Overrides:
        reactToCollision in class Moveable
        Parameters:
        other - Entity with which this Entity has collided.
        notOnTheEdge - true if other is truly inside this Entity, not simply on the edge.

      • die

        public void die()
        Causes Killable Entity to die.

        Rat is relocated to the defaultPosition() and signals gameLogic to lose a life for player 1.

        Specified by:
        die in interface Killable

      • update

        public void update()
        This method is called every tick on the timer.

        Rat moves, checks for collisions and creates Tails.

        Specified by:
        update in interface Updatable
        Overrides:
        update in class Moveable

      • draw

        public void draw(Graphics g,
        double offsetX,
        double offsetY,
        double xMultiplier,
        double yMultiplier)
        Contains instructions on how to represent this entity in the GameField.

        Rat is a black rectangle.

        Overrides:
        draw in class Positioned
        Parameters:
        g - Graphics data.
        offsetX - X position of the drawing field in respect to window's location.
        offsetY - Y position of the drawing field in respect to window's location.
        xMultiplier - Horizontal stretching based on window's width.
        yMultiplier - Vertical stretching based on window's height.
